short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks SSO redirects on a certain chinese resellers!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Google Extension prevents the automatic redirect to sso.weidian.com from weidian store item pages, when you are not logged in. Now includes similar blocking for Taobao.com and 1688.com login redirects!
